content: अकाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नास्ति कामो यस्य] {@--1@} Free from desire, affection, love; अकामस्य क्रिया काचिद्दृश्यते नेह कर्हिचित् <ls>Ms. 2. 4</ls> every thing is an act of his will. {@--2@} Reluctant, unwilling; °मां कन्यां <ls n="Ms.">4. 364</ls>; so नाकामो दातुमर्हति. {@--3@} Uninfluenced by, not subject to, love; भयादकामापि हि दृष्टिविभ्रमं <ls>Ś. 1. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Unconscious, unintentional; अकामोपनतेनेव साधोर्हृदयमेनसा <ls>R. 10. 39</ls> unconsciously committed. {@--5@} The Saṃdhi which causes the dropping of a final र् before a following र्.
